item.title: Decoding the Data Landscape: Dr. Kiran R on Data Science & Innovation
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: In this episode of Leading with Data, we’re joined by Dr. Kiran R, a distinguished leader in Applied ML and Data Science, who shares insights from his extensive experience at Microsoft, VMware, and beyond. With a Ph.D. from IIM Lucknow and an MBA from IIM Kozhikode, Dr. Kiran has led high-impact teams, earning accolades such […]
item.content:encoded:
In this episode of Leading with Data, we’re joined by Dr. Kiran R, a distinguished leader in Applied ML and Data Science, who shares insights from his extensive experience at Microsoft, VMware, and beyond. With a Ph.D. from IIM Lucknow and an MBA from IIM Kozhikode, Dr. Kiran has led high-impact teams, earning accolades such […]

The post Decoding the Data Landscape: Dr. Kiran R on Data Science & Innovation appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.
